```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r packages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
library(knitr)
```

## Data

```{r data}
Survey_Responses <- read_excel("~/Survey Responses.xlsx", 
    sheet = "Sheet1")
View(Survey_Responses)
```

## EDA of ED vs. RD

```{r countED}
Survey_Responses %>%
  count(ED) %>%
  kable()
```

```{r EDbar}
ggplot(data = Survey_Responses, mapping = aes(x = ED)) +
  geom_bar() +
  theme_minimal()+
  labs(title = "Did you apply to Duke via the Early Decision Process?")
  
```
